Game: Midnight Play! Pack Midnight Play! Pack is a compilation of five Gameloft mobile games, ported to the Nintendo DS. The games are: Block Breaker Deluxe Midnight Pool Midnight Bowling Midnight Hold'em Poker Platinum Solitaire The Midnight games are 3D versions. <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/841b5430-7e67-4f95-8884-a294a69fb3c3.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/dfddb2e2-93a2-42dd-aab2-66572bcf24b4.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/112d1052-47ff-404d-b67e-5ee6935e285c.png
